report.title: Species counts league position for taxa, with standard params
report.description: Retrieves your position in the league table for count of taxa.
report.query: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT #columns# FROM people p JOIN users u ON u.person_id=p.id AND u.deleted=false AND u.id<>1 JOIN cache_occurrences_functional o ON o.created_by_id=u.id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND p.deleted=false #filters# #group_bys# ) AS sub WHERE id=#user_id#

param.name: user_id
param.description: Warehouse ID of user to retrieve league position for

column.name: position
column.sql: row_number() over (order by count(DISTINCT CASE o.zero_abundance WHEN true THEN NULL ELSE o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key END) desc)

column.name: value
column.sql: count(DISTINCT CASE o.zero_abundance WHEN true THEN NULL ELSE o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key END)
